name: Welcome to the Animotel!
description:
***** Welcome to the ANIMOTEL! *****

You're the manager of the hotel and it's your evening shift, suddenly every client has a complaint.
You should tend to their needs as  the success of the ANIMOTEL depends on you!
Make sure to appease every client so that they can sleep peacefully!

Use WASD or the Arrow Keys to move around and interact! 
[P.S.: There's dialogue and interactions for everything! Go interact and explore!]

A simple funny/cute game made using the Bitsy Game Maker by Adam Le Doux.
